languages.text: Доказательства против рода Версериан не внушают доверия, и Абеляр отказывается верить в причастность своей семьи к заговору против Вольного Торговца. Возможно, Лорд-капитану удастся найти алиби для рода сенешаля.

traits.locale_text: Доказательства против рода Версериан не внушают доверия, и Абеляр отказывается верить в причастность своей семьи к заговору против Вольного Торговца. Возможно, Лорд-капитану удастся раздобыть алиби для рода сенешаля.

languages.text: The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.
languages.original_text: Доказательства против рода Версериан не внушают доверия, и Абеляр отказывается верить в причастность своей семьи к заговору против Вольного Торговца. Возможно, Лорд-капитану удастся найти алиби для рода сенешаля.

traits.locale_text: The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family has had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family has had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

languages.text: Die Beweise gegen das Haus Werserian sind zweifelhaft, und Abelard weigert sich zu glauben, dass seine Familie irgendetwas mit der Verschwörung gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu tun hatte. Vielleicht kann der Lord Captain dem Adelshaus {mf|seines|ihres} Truchsess eine Art Alibi verschaffen.
languages.original_text: The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

traits.locale_text: Die Beweise gegen das Haus Werserian sind zweifelhaft, und Abelard weigert sich zu glauben, dass seine Familie irgendetwas mit der Verschwörung gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu tun hatte. Vielleicht kann der Lord Captain dem Adelshaus {mf|seines|ihres} Truchsess eine Art Alibi verschaffen.

languages.text: Les preuves contre la maison Werserian sont suspectes, et Abélard refuse de croire que sa famille ait été impliquée dans la conspiration qui a ciblé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Peut-être {mf|le seigneur-capitaine peut-il|la seigneure-capitaine peut-elle} trouver un quelconque alibi à la noble maison de son sénéchal ?
languages.original_text: The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

traits.locale_text: Les preuves contre la maison Werserian sont suspectes, et Abélard refuse de croire que sa famille ait été impliquée dans la conspiration qui a ciblé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Peut-être {mf|le seigneur-capitaine peut-il|la seigneure-capitaine peut-elle} trouver un quelconque alibi à la noble maison de son sénéchal ?

languages.text: ウェルザリアン家に対する証拠は疑わしいと思われたため、アベラルドは自分の一族が自由開拓者に対する陰謀に関わっていることを信じようとしない。おそらく、ロード・キャプテンが家令長の貴族家について何らかのアリバイを立証できるだろう。
languages.original_text: The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

traits.locale_text: ウェルザリアン家に対する証拠は疑わしいと思われたため、アベラルドは自分の一族が自由開拓者に対する陰謀に関わっていることを信じようとしない。おそらく、ロード・キャプテンが家令長の貴族家について何らかのアリバイを立証できるだろう。

languages.text: Las pruebas contra la casa Werserian son dudosas y Abelard se niega a creer que su familia sea partícipe de la conspiración contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Tal vez {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pueda establecer alguna coartada para la casa de su Senescal.
languages.original_text: The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

traits.locale_text: Las pruebas contra la casa Werserian son dudosas y Abelard se niega a creer que su familia sea partícipe de la conspiración contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Tal vez {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pueda establecer alguna coartada para la casa de su Senescal.

languages.text: 针对韦尔森家族的证据似乎有些可疑，阿贝拉德不肯相信他的家族参与了反叛行商浪人的阴谋。或许领主舰长可以为总领的家族提供证据，证明家族的清白。
languages.original_text: The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.

traits.locale_text: 针对韦尔森家族的证据似乎有些可疑，阿贝拉德不肯相信他的家族参与了反叛行商浪人的阴谋。或许领主舰长可以为总领的家族提供证据，证明家族的清白。

languages.text: Werserian Hanesi'yle ilgili kanıtlar pek inandırıcı durmuyor ve Abelard, ailesinin Hür Tacir'e karşı bir entrikaya karıştığına inanmayı reddediyor. Belki Lord Kaptan, Seneşal'in soylu hanesi için bir gerekçe bulabilir.
languages.original_text: The evidence against House Werserian seems dubious, and Abelard refuses to believe that his family had anything to do with the conspiracy against the Rogue Trader. Perhaps the Lord Captain could establish some sort of alibi for {mf|his|her} Seneschal's noble house.
